title: Joshua Commissioned, The Law Delivered
summary: Deuteronomy 31 describes Moses preparing for his death by encouraging the people and commissioning Joshua as his successor. Moses writes down the law and gives it to the priests. God foretells Israel’s future unfaithfulness.

faq.question: What does Moses say to encourage Israel?
faq.answer: To be strong and courageous because God will go with them and never leave them.

faq.question: What does God say about Israel’s future?
faq.answer: That they will turn away from Him, but His word will remain as a witness against them.
